CustomField.formula: IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone__c , " ", ""), '+45'), SUBSTITUTE(Phone__c , " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone__c , " ", ""), '45'), '+' + SUBSTITUTE(Phone__c , " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone__c , " ", ""), '+45')), ISPICKVAL(Country__c, 'Denmark') ), '+45' + SUBSTITUTE(Phone__c , " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone__c , " ", ""), '+46'), SUBSTITUTE(Phone__c , " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone__c , " ", ""), '46'), '+' + SUBSTITUTE(Phone__c , " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone__c , " ", ""), '+46')), ISPICKVAL(Country__c, 'Sweden') ), '+46' + SUBSTITUTE(Phone__c , " ", ""), SUBSTITUTE(Phone__c , " ", "") ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Phone (Formatted)
